title: Tarar grieved over demise of mother of senior journalists Aon, Nokhaiz Sahi
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 13 (APP): Federal Minister for Information, Broadcasting and National Heritage Attaullah Tarar on Saturday expressed deep grief over the death of the mother of senior journalists Aon Sahi and Nokhaiz Sahi.
In a condolence message, the minister expressed his heartfelt condolences and sympathy to the family of the deceased.
Terming the death of the mother of Aon Sahi and Nokhaiz Sahi an irreparable loss and a great shock to the bereaved family, he said he shared their grief.
He prayed to Allah Almighty to rest the departed soul in eternal peace and grant courage to the bereaved family to bear this loss with fortitude.
